instruction: Currently, the program my_process.sh is running in the system and I want to end the process. Can you help me?

parameters.command:
echo -e '#!/bin/bash

while true; do
echo "Running my_process..."
sleep 1
done' > my_process.sh && chmod +x my_process.sh && nohup ./my_process.sh > /dev/null 2>&1 &

result.command: [[ -z $(ps -ef | grep -v grep | grep my_process) ]] && echo "Process killed" || echo "Process still running"
